com.ibm.watson.dsm.services.gaian

Class GaianRuleEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.dsm.util.AbstractListenerManager<IEvaluationListener,java.util.List<TupleState>,java.lang.Object,java.lang.Boolean>
      • com.ibm.watson.dsm.engine.AbstractRuleEngine
        • com.ibm.watson.dsm.engine.app.DSMEngine
          • com.ibm.watson.dsm.services.gaian.GaianRuleEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRuleEngine

    public class GaianRuleEngine
extends DSMEngine
implements IRuleEngine
    This extends the superclass only to override evaluateTupleRules(boolean, com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.tuples.ITupleSet...) so as to capture the injection of a reset tuple which we want to cause all tables to be cleared.
    Note that we would normally have liked the injection of the reset tuple to be handled inside the rules themselves, but we're having trouble getting that work. Given the short time before ACITA 2012, we'll implement reset here instead of in the rules themselves.
    Author:
    dawood

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void evaluateTupleRules(boolean isInsert, ITupleSet... tuples)
      Override so that after calling the super class, look for a tuple in the GaianOpinionManager.INPUT_RESET_TABLE_NAME table and if seen, then clear all tuples.
